reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress fits well and is flattering for curvy figures, with one mentioning it can be dressed up or down with tennis shoes. The material is thick and nice, and customers appreciate its stretchiness and comfort, with one noting they can even sleep in it. The length receives mixed feedback, with some loving it while others find it too long. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good stretch but not flimsy.
items.body: I am curvy. 38.30 38 Extra Large fit perfectly! I am 5 feet 6 inches tall. I weigh 189 lbs. I travel a lot so I look for clothes that have multiple uses. This dress is a bit thick, but still appropriate in the summer! It also makes a great lounging dress or you can even sleep in it! It is so sexy, and you can wear it comfortably off one shoulder or off both. It works great! I don't often write reviews and I am REALLY picky. I bought this in every color. If you have big boobs, it is not too revealing but still feels like you could wear it out without flaunting yourself. Ignore the picture. It is not that extreme if you are big up top. Read more
items.author: linda d.

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Color is off but nice dress
items.body: Pretty dress but the color was more muted not as vibrant as shown. More of a soft pink. This is a cotton blend I thought it was sweater material. I will keep it, the fit was nice, hugs the curves. Read more
items.author: NYKim

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Oh Yea! I made a Great choice!
items.body: Now there are so many dresses like this on Amazon and choosing one could be difficult and most times we tend to rely on reviews and sometimes we may not get enough or satisfactory information so let me see if I can help. First of all my measurements are bust 41 inches waist 36 and my hips are 45 inches I'm 5'4. This dress the fabric is not to thick and not at all thin. It's actually just looks rick, black and perfect for spring or fall and the length falls just at my ankles which btw I was hoping for. the sleeves are very comfortable and I have a bit thick arms, really really comfortable! the length of the sleeves was perfect too. The dress is a deep V front and back and look better off the shoulder than on and it stays put. I felt very comfortable with movement as the dress contoured my curves without being extremely tight and uncomfortable it also narrow at the bottom giving you that shapely silhouette. I bought an XL and it's the size I would normally wear. Hope this helps you guys. It's a fantastic dress. You won't be disappointed! Read more
items.author: Paige Libert

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Unfortunately not the best
items.body: The description says its sweater material thick and not see through but honestly it is see through and not thick at all doesnâ€™t feel like sweater material either. Read more

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Dookey green dress
items.body: Amazon sat here and gave me Dookie green when I asked for black and it says green in the system when I picked black so I had to re-order this dress again, but I would definitely recommend it because itâ€™s very pretty. Itâ€™s nice for everybodyâ€™s size if you have curved soldier curves very well I definitely recommend itâ€™s stretchy. Itâ€™s a nice material is very soft. I ordered it because I was taking photos for my sonâ€™s birthday birthday and it came out very nice. I would highly recommend for anybody. Any size the color on my behalf, I didnâ€™t like the green, but the color therefore anybody who wants that green color, my behalf, I like the black, but I do highly recommend. I was just unsatisfied that they sat here and gave me the green one when I had ordered the black so I had to order this twice. Read more
items.author: Karissa

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Goodness I Love This Dress!
items.body: I haven't been to the movies in ten years and decided that I would take myself out to go see the new wicked movie. I decide to stay in theme with green or pink, going with green since that's my favorite color. I was wary to order this address. But I saw reviews of women a bit larger than myself that said it fit them perfectly. So I took a chance, and i'm so glad that I did. This dress is absolutely beautiful. It goes all the way down to Your calves and then some. There's a little bit of elastic around the shoulder part, and it stays around your shoulders and doesn't roll up or down, which is perfect for somebody like me, a big back with linebacker shouldersðŸ˜­ðŸ˜­ It's not see through and of a decent thickness, and is a good strong knit. I also appreciate the streps to tie around your midsection so the dress doesn't look so flat and bland and draw a lot of attention to your belly, if you have one like me lol. It's also very comfortable, yet hugs you in all the right places. I'm going to order this dress in more colors!ðŸ’šðŸ’šðŸ’š Read more
items.author: Munchkin

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Off Shoulder Bodycon is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Off Shoulder Bodycon is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Winered, 753purple, White9388, Darkblue8753, Yellow8753, 753blue, Black, Pink8753, Armygreen, 753rose, Dark Green, Red, Winered9388, White. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
